alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Clarke; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Monroe; Ringgold; Union; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 5:25AM CST until January 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Winter Storm Continues Early this Morning... .Snow will continue to slide southward this morning, largely exiting the state by sunrise. Breezy winds will continue to cause periods of blowing and drifting snow after snow subsides, but too will subside as the morning progresses. Travel will remain hazardous at times, due to the blowing and drifting snow and snow covered and icy roadways. ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 or more inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Much of southern Iowa. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will continue to be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibilities and drifting on roadways. The hazardous conditions and poor roads will impact travel through at least mid- morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 5 1 1 app or dial 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Clarke; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Monroe; Ringgold; Union; Wapello; Wayne
